purpose: To provide sample code and notebooks for developing and deploying Generative AI applications on Google Cloud
principle: Leverages Google Cloud's Vertex AI and Gemini API to facilitate the creation and deployment of large language models and generative AI solutions
reusability: Includes reusable code snippets and notebooks that can be adapted for various generative AI applications on Google Cloud
limitations: Primarily designed for users with access to Google Cloud services; requires familiarity with cloud-based AI tools
name: generative-ai
description: Sample code and notebooks for Generative AI on Google Cloud, with Gemini on Vertex AI
highlight: Comprehensive resources for building and deploying Generative AI models on Google Cloud using Vertex AI and Gemini
